scripts.fresh: npx rimraf node_modules && npx concurrently --names "renterd,hostd,walletd" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" "cd renterd && npm run fresh" "cd hostd && npm run fresh" "cd walletd && npm run fresh"
scripts.install:all: npx concurrently --names "renterd,hostd,walletd" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" "cd renterd && npm install --workspaces=false" "cd hostd && npm install --workspaces=false" "cd walletd && npm install --workspaces=false"
scripts.lint: npx concurrently --names "renterd,hostd,walletd" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" "cd renterd && npm run lint" "cd hostd && npm run lint" "cd walletd && npm run lint"
scripts.download:all: npx concurrently --names "renterd,hostd,walletd" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" "npm run download:renterd" "npm run download:hostd" "npm run download:walletd"
